product_name: Planet Bike Blinky 7 Rear Bike Light
long_description: This tail light lets others see you not only from the back but from the sides as well. Seven ultra-bright Extreme(TM) red LEDs are aimed in five directions for 220 degrees of visibility for up to one mile. Ultra compact vertical design is weatherproof, light weight and durable. Flashing and steady mode. Includes bike mounts, clip mount and arm strap to give you options. Includes two AAA batteries.
short_description: This tail light lets others see you not only from the back but from the sides as well.
